jcurses.event
类 WindowListenerManager

java.lang.Object
  jcurses.event.ListenerManager
      jcurses.event.WindowListenerManager

public class WindowListenerManager
extends ListenerManager

This class implements a listener manager to manage jcurses.event.ValueChangedEvent instances and listener on these. Only possible type of handled events is jcurses.event.ValueChangedEvent, of managed listeners id jcurses.event.ValueChangedListener

构造方法摘要
WindowListenerManager()
           
 
方法摘要
protected  void doHandleEvent(Event event, Listener listener)
          The method is called by handleElent for each registered listener.
protected  void verifyEvent(Event event)
          The method verifies an event object to be of the right type for this listener manager
protected  void verifyListener(Listener listener)
          The method verifies an listener object to be of the right type for this listener manager
 
从类 jcurses.event.ListenerManager 继承的方法
addListener, countListeners, handleEvent, removeListener
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

构造方法详细信息

WindowListenerManager

public WindowListenerManager()
方法详细信息

doHandleEvent

protected void doHandleEvent(Event event,
                             Listener listener)
从类 ListenerManager 复制的描述
The method is called by handleElent for each registered listener. In order this method has to call an method of the listener object with handled event as parameter

指定者：
类 ListenerManager 中的 doHandleEvent
参数：
event - event to be handled
listener - listener to handle

verifyListener

protected void verifyListener(Listener listener)
从类 ListenerManager 复制的描述
The method verifies an listener object to be of the right type for this listener manager

指定者：
类 ListenerManager 中的 verifyListener
参数：
listener - listener to be verified

verifyEvent

protected void verifyEvent(Event event)
从类 ListenerManager 复制的描述
The method verifies an event object to be of the right type for this listener manager

指定者：
类 ListenerManager 中的 verifyEvent
参数：
event - event to be verified
